medium: Silk, wool, cotton; chain stitch, fishbone stitch, checkered chain stitch
title: Tent hanging
description: Cloth band, No backing cloth, pieced and printed lining. Red wool ground fabric pieced with black cotton pieced velvet border, embroidered with silk threads. The backing is printed cotton fabric. One hanging tab at top. Chain stitch, herrinbone.
creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
